
                            
                            <p>昨天刷了第一遍面漆，明天刷第二遍，目前发现很多小气泡有的破了，有的没破，有些是小疙瘩。只加了百分之5的纯净水，有气泡是什么原因？其次大家看下第一遍效果怎么样？花了100多买的克里斯汀丝光大师刷子。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180214qmgn0mrnpiri7mgc.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180214qmgn0mrnpiri7mgc.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180219bsxxwxrzv7jecqxs.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180219bsxxwxrzv7jecqxs.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180250nwpr1fcx1jufxuz1.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180250nwpr1fcx1jufxuz1.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180255ijiumau1rzjf6uyq.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180255ijiumau1rzjf6uyq.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180302chr5glgr4g82grsg.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180302chr5glgr4g82grsg.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180308j9z69jj1af2dq6q2.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180308j9z69jj1af2dq6q2.jpeg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180317i1kunxzwunvur80u.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/180317i1kunxzwunvur80u.jpeg"> <br> </p>
